work_order_id.description: Unique identifier for each maintenance incident. Multiple rows can share the same work_order_id (one row per technician update).

product_line.description: Equipment family/product line that the equipment belongs to

start_date.description: Date the work order was opened. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

start_time.description: Time of day the work started. Format: HH:MM:SS

end_date.description: Date the work order was closed. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

end_time.description: Time of day the work was completed. Format: HH:MM:SS

description.description: Structured incident classification following hierarchical format: TYPE / PRODUCT_LINE / SYSTEM / CATEGORY / DETAIL
examples: COR / HAAS_VF_SERIES / HYDRAULIC / PRESSURE / LOW PRESSURE ALARM
PREV / SCHULER_HYDRAULIC / SCHEDULED / PM / QUARTERLY MAINTENANCE CHECK
COR / ABB_WELD_ROBOT / SENSOR / FAILURE / PROXIMITY SENSOR NOT RESPONDING

comment.description: Free-text technician notes about diagnosis, repair actions, and follow-ups
examples: Inspected CNC-01. Found worn bearing. Root cause: vibration fatigue.
Replaced hydraulic seal. Tested and confirmed normal operation.
Will monitor for next 48 hours. If issue recurs, full spindle motor replacement needed.

symptom_code.description: Categorical classification of the issue type
